Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Bacambalale lapho phakathi bayomemeza lapho phakathi (becela) izithelo eziningi kanye nokuphuzwayo
Futhi eduzane kuyobe kunabesifazane abayobe bezithobile ekubhekeni, ontanga ngeminyaka
Lokhu yilokhu enethenjiswa kona kwelanga lokubala
Ngempela lokhu yisabelo sethu esingeke siphele
Lokhu, futhi ngempela kwabenza okubi kunesiphetho esibi sokubuyela
Isihogo bayongena kusona, yimbi leyondawo yokuphumula
Lokhu abakuzwe amanzi abilayo kanye nobovu
Kanye nokunye kohlobo lwako
Leli yiqembu elingena kanye nani, angeke bemukelwe ngempela bona bayongena emlilweni
Bayothi, “Chabo! Nina anemukelwe, nina nakuletha kuthina yimbi indawo yokuhlala”
Futhi bayothi, “Nkosi yethu lowo owaletha lokhu kuthina ngakho-ke mnezelele ngesijeziso esiphindwe kabili emlilweni”
Futhi bayothi, “kungani singawaboni amadoda (abantu) esasibabala phakathi kwabalungileyo
Ngakube sibathathe njengenhlekisa noma amehlo akakwazi ukubabona
Ngempela lelo yiqiniso – ingxabano nokuphikisana kwabantu bomlilo
Ithi,“kuphelaminangingumxwayisifuthiakekhouNkulunkulu ekufanele akhonzwe ngaphandle kukaMvelinqangi oyedwa umnqobi”
INkosi yamazulu nomhlaba kanye nako konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili iphakeme ngamandla, iyathethelela
Ithi, “loko kuyizindaba ezinkulu”
Nina enizifulathelayo
Anginalo ulwazi ngabaholi (izinduna) eziphakeme ngenkathi ziphikisana
Akwembulwanga lutho kumina ngaphandle kokuthi mina ngingumxwayisi ogqamile kuphela
Khumbula ngenkathi iNkosi yakho ithi ezingelosini, “ngempela mina ngingumdali womuntu ngobumba”
Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sengimenzile ngamphefumulela ngomoya wami nabe seniwa phansi najabalala ngaphambili kwakhe
Ngakho-ke izingelosi zaguqa ngokuzithoba zonke ndawonye
Ngaphandle kuka-Iblis waqhosha futhi wabangomunye wabangakholwa
Wathi (uMvelinqangi), “Oh Iblis! Yini ekuvimbelayo ukuthi uthobele lowo engimdale ngezandla zami zombili na? Ngakube uziphakamisile noma ubengomunye walabo abaphakeme na
Wathi (u-Iblis) mina ngingcono kunaye ungidale ngomlilo wabe sewumdala ngobumba
Wathi (uMvelinqangi) ngakho-ke phuma kulona (izulu) ngempela wena ungogxoshiweyo
Futhi ngempela siphezu kwakho isiqalekiso sami kuze kube usuku lokwehlulela
Wathi (u-Iblis), “Nkosi yami nginike ithuba kuze kube usuku abayovuswa ngalo
(UMvelinqangi) wathi ngakho-ke ngempela wena ungomunye wabanikwe ithuba
Kuze kube wusuku lwesikhathi esaziwayo
Wathi, “ngakho-ke ngokuhlonipheka kwakho ngempela ngizobadukisa bonke”
Ngaphandle kwezinceku zakho ezikhethiwe phakathi kwabo
Wathi, “yiqiniso futhi yiqiniso engilishoyo”
Ngempela ngizogcwalisa isihogo ngawe kanye nangabobonke abakulandelayo phakathi kwabo
Ithi anginiceli umvuzo ngako futhi mina angiyena omunye wabakhohlisi
Akuyilutho ngaphandle kwesikhumbuzo emihlabeni. 89. Futhi ngempela nizozazi izindaba zaso emva kwesikhashana
Isambulo sencwadi sivela kuMvelinqangi ophakeme ngamandla onobuhlakani
Ngempela sayembula kuwena incwadi ngeqiniso, ngakho-ke khonza uMvelinqangi ube qotho kuyena enkolweni

Ngokungangabazeki, ingekaMvelinqangi inkolo eqotho futhi labo abazithathele abavikeli esikhundleni sakhe (bathi) kuphela sibakhonzela ukuthi basisondeze eduzane noMvelinqangi ngempela uMvelinqangi akamholi lowo ongumqambi manga ongabongi
Ukube uMvelinqangi wayethanda ukuthatha indondana wayezokhetha kulokho akudalayo akuthandayo, udumo malube kuye! Yena unguMvelinqangi oyedwa umnqobi

Wadala amazulu nomhlaba ngeqiniso, wenza ukuthi ubusuku bumboze imini futhi wenza ukuthi imini imboze ubusuku futhi wenza ilanga nenyanga kwathoba, konke kuhamba ngesikhathi esinqunyiwe ngokungangabazeki yena ungophakeme ngamandla ungothethelelayo

Wanidala ngomphefumulo owodwa wabe esenza ngaye unkosikazi wakhe futhi wanehlisela phansi imfuyo engambili eyisishiyagalombili, unidala eziswini zabomama benu, indalo emva kwendalo ebumnyameni obuphindiwe kathathu lowo nguMvelinqangi iNkosi yenu bungobakhe ubukhosi akekho uNkulunkulu onokukhonzwa ngaphandle kwakhe ngakho-ke niphendukiselwa kanjani emumva

Uma ningakholwa ngakho-ke ngempela uMvelinqangi akanidingi futhi akakuthandi ukungakholwa ezincekwini zakhe futhi uma nibonga uyakuthokozela kunina, futhi akekho umthwali womthwalo oyothwala umthwalo womunye bese kuba seNkosini yenu ukubuyela kwenu bese iyanitshela ngaloko enanikwenza, ngempela yona iyisazi saloko okusezifubeni
